text: Tajak bak Kamoe jinoe sidroe-droe Lagee gatanyoe phon-phon meupisah Meupisah ngon ma meupeujeut gata Sidroe teuh saja meunan keu ulah Peue nyang Kamoe bri dilee keu gata Tinggai sigala bandum takeubah Hana Kamoe eu pih sajan gata Peue nyang tadawa dilee taseumah Tuhan charikat takheun ngon gata Nyang peuglah gata dilee tapeugah Putoh hubungan jinoe ngon gata Hana meuhoka peue nyang taseumah
